itunes:title: #161 - Side Hustle with Chris Guillebeau
title: #161 - Side Hustle with Chris Guillebeau
description:
Chris Guillebeau joins us to talk about what it means to have a side hustle and how that affects the job market today. We're talking about funneling your drive to be a creative entrepreneur and how to create boundaries, containers, and rules to help you do the work.

This episode is sponsored by Freshbooks Cloud Accounting

Get full show notes for this episode here
